product_name: Terry Bolero Light Arm Warmers - Women's
long_description: For lightweight warmth on your bike before you warm up, wear the Terry Bolero Light Arm Warmers. The one-piece bolero is easy to keep track of when you stow it away. Nylon/spandex fabric stretches to easily pull on and off. Enjoy UPF 50+ sun protection with the Terry Bolero Light Arm Warmers.
short_description: For lightweight warmth on your bike before you warm up, wear the Terry Bolero Light Arm Warmers. The one-piece bolero is easy to keep track of when you stow it away.
